item.description:
Another great night of dancing, with Don't Call Me Shirley!!!!

Let's go cheer the band on, at a NEW location!!!!

Captain Carlo's atmosphere has a casual, nautical feel, but when the lights are dimmed and the candles are lit, our elegance shines, never losing that very comfortable setting for the whole family. Outside dining is always a favorite on a sunny day. Our deck and dockside dining areas allow our customers to dine alongside Gloucester's inner harbor and watch the vessels unload their daily catch.

PLEASE Note: This will be another popular event!  I will try to hold tables for everyone that is attending (for both groups). BUT please be patient if we are not able to hold tables/seats for everyone.

Cover charge: NONE

Time: Band starts at 9:00pm

Parking: Anywhere in their lot.


This event will be scheduled on my 2 Meetup sites, (A Circle of Friends and Connection & Friends) there may be more people going to this event then you see.

Take a minute now and put the Meetup phone into your phone, that way if you are are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, you already have it in your phone:  978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you in advance for paying your dues!

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

Looking forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.name: Dance baby dance: Don't Call Me Shirley
